law.catch_line: Requirement to secure transported solid waste or recyclable material.

text.section:
Sec. 15-7. Requirement to secure transported solid waste or recyclable material.
It shall be unlawful for any person to haul, convey, or cause to be hauled or conveyed, any solid waste or recyclable material upon or along public streets, roads or alleys except when the material transported is adequately secured in such manner as to prevent the material from falling or being blown from the transporting vehicles.
